name: Space Jesus 64 (C64)
description:
Space Jesus 64 is an action-packed Shoot 'em up for your Commodore 64. It is available both as .tap and as .d64 to download for free.

The premise is simple: Blast your way across the five outer planets of our solar system, to reach Earth. On your adventure, you will encounter aliens, robots and even Satan himself. You have eight directions of movement and lasers shooting from your eyes as your attack.  Avoid the Space Walls, asteroids and other hazards and see if you can make it to the end.

(Fun note: You can technically 'finish' the game as a pacifist, not killing a single enemy)

It's a fairly short game, but with plenty of challenge, offering a high-score (with save-functionality for .d64 -version) and lots of *fun*.

It currently has no music, due to my own musical inability; But it does have some rather neat sound-effects.

(There is (technically) a two-player mode available, but due to a bug the game will crash after Player 2 has entered their name.

Player 2 controls a robot, which can both move and shoot further than Space Jesus, also the robot is unaffected by background-objects, such as "Space walls".)
